localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
blogPost.body: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
blogPost.title: Send a Mixtape - Give a digital playlist on a paper crafted cassette
blogPost.author: Tom Henderson

localize.description: 播放列表来来去去，但mixtape是永远的。粘贴你的播放列表URL，它将自动添加到纸质mixtape模板。下载，打印，折叠，并分发一些怀旧。
localize.tagline: 在纸制卡带上赠送一个数字播放列表。

localize.description: 播放列表來來去去，但mixtape是永遠的。粘貼你的播放列表URL，它將自動添加到紙質mixtape模板。下載，打印，摺疊，並分發一些懷舊。
localize.tagline: 在紙製卡帶上贈送一個數字播放列表。

previous.excerpt: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.
previous.title: Community Fund - An early-stage accelerator to help communities grow from 0-1

localize.description: 社区基金是由The Product Folks发起的一项倡议，旨在帮助社区提供从0-1的指导、资金和所需的重要资源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，帮助社区从0-1成长起来

localize.description: 社區基金是由The Product Folks發起的一項倡議，旨在幫助社區提供從0-1的指導、資金和所需的重要資源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，幫助社區從0-1成長起來

next.excerpt: Binndle is a simple app to find and share the products people use. Find out what software your peers use, or what books your idol has read, and then share your daily tools too.
next.title: Binndle - Find what products people use

localize.description: Binndle是一款简单的应用，可以找到并分享人们使用的产品。找出你的同龄人用了什么软件，或者你的偶像读了什么书，然后也分享你的日常工具。
Binndle是一款簡單的應用，可以找到並分享人們使用的產品。找出你的同齡人用了什麼軟件，或者你的偶像讀了什麼書，然後也分享你的日常工具。
